entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. A few flurries beginning late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
